define([ "../core", "../selector" ], function( jQuery ) { jQuery.expr.filters.hidden = function( elem ) {

Support: Opera <= 12.12 Opera reports offsetWidths and offsetHeights less than zero on some elements

return elem.offsetWidth <= 0 && elem.offsetHeight <= 0; }; jQuery.expr.filters.visible = function( elem ) { return !jQuery.expr.filters.hidden( elem ); }; });
